post.body: Some value came out of that weekly all hands.
Online shopping for a pair of hiking pants that'll make me look like the Icelandic gal in Journey to the Center of the Earth. No luck.
Just finished watching last wk's Top Chef episode.Anyone who uses the workd "spluge" to describe their food definitely deserves to go home!
Kind of impressed by how quick the current Prez's reflexes are.
John Cleese is on Twitter! I once stood in line behind him at a grocery store. I think I may be about as tall as his waist line. #johncleese
Looking through my credit card statement online and see an ad for Sony underneath my purchase at Fry's Electronics. Clever!
Courtney gets a mention in this NY Times article about up and coming grrrl surfers http://twurl.nl/rmdjjd
I now know how to pronounce "Blagojevich." That is all...
Corporate Logos Remixed for Crisis... http://twurl.nl/gxummz
Disappointed that there's a long wait for "Wanted" on my Netflix queue, and that I'm getting X-Files instead.
This story just makes me so incredibly sad. http://twurl.nl/kk32a3
F-18 jet crashes in San Diego neighborhood! Yikes! http://twurl.nl/5k37o3
Half a million jobs go bye-bye in Nov. 2.7 million gone since the start of the recession. http://twurl.nl/oxxeor
For those who were able to snag a $500 42" flat screen HDTV on that day, what I want to know is...was it worth it? http://twurl.nl/k1f06g
Apply for a federal bailout. Haha! http://twurl.nl/fave66
Eating the fruitcake that my mom brought over on Thanksgiving
Suffering from a syndrome called "too much pie."
Feeling kinda thankful that I'm still employed one year into a recession. http://twurl.nl/42e3v4
"China losing luster w/US manufacturers...finds rising worries about...intellectual property theft." Well, duh! http://twurl.nl/t1icdw
Thankful that I don't have to drive anywhere for Thanksgiving on this rainy day.
Should I watch this? I don't think I can handle another mush-mouthed yank butcher Shakespeare. http://twurl.nl/ziacb8
I don't know why I keep renting movies like Knocked Up,Sarah Marshall, & Superbad about doughy guys who get hot gfs. I just don't get them
Car won't start, so I'll have to ride my bike down to the Walmart to do some last minute shopping. I guess that'll be my cardio for today.
Eating a warm apple pie topped with whipped cream instead running a meeting. Life is good.
In a slow week like this, I kinda like it when no one shows up for a meeting.
Trying to get the energy up to go for a hike.
Today is winter solstice. Happy that days will start getting longer from here on out.
Wrapping gifts. Ever notice how the rolls of gift wrap are never big enough to wrap more than one gift? Grrrr...
Just found a pile of Books to Read that I had set aside at the beginning of the year. They have not been read. Oops.
CA unemployment hits 8.4% And this is before the BK state follows thru with its plan to lay off 10% of state workers.http://twurl.nl/e04bwf
PKrugman suggests we all read Dickens' Little Dorrit b/c a character strongly resembles Madoff. Will we see debtors' prisons come back too?
Found #TwitFitter for people who tweet about fitness. There's a question on motivation. How about getting a hot personal trainer? Haha!
I hate how SERA4 is always logging me off. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it. Hate it.Hate it.Hate it.
Trestles is saved! Hallelujah! http://twurl.nl/ipjzfd
*I think* I'm done with Christmas shopping. Now I just have to wrap the gifts.
It seems investors are betting that California will go bankrupt. Gray Davis got recalled for less, no? http://twurl.nl/v8j5vm
Deleted my browser cookies, and I'm now seeing AT&T and Ford ads in my AOL Mail. so yeah, these sites are using tracking cookies. Bleah.
Wondering if my browser cookies are giving me away as someone who's interested in athletic gear and consumer electronics.
These Under Armour ads inspire me so much that...I think I'll go to the Nike Store at the mall! Can't have too many running tanks.
I am seeing Under Armour ads everywhere. And I am clicking on them.
